About the Company: Firstobject Technologies Ltd is an imminent IT / ITEs and an e-education company. FTL chiefly has three divisions. First one being development of ERP products, Softwares, IT projects. Second being Equity research and analysis. The third and also the latest, ie e-learning based curriculum for all study groups and all languages. FTL is now a player in the K-12, Legal, Management and Engineering segments. It is slowly bringing more schools into its fold for implementation of its e-learning modules.
